sorcer.util

Interface FileURLHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataService

    public interface FileURLHandler
    Created by Mike Sobolewsko on 6/19/15 based on the DataService class

    • Method Detail

      • getDataURL

        java.net.URL getDataURL(java.lang.String path)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Get a URL for a file path.
        Parameters:
        path - The file path to obtain a URL for.
        Returns:
        A URL that can be used to access the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file does not exist, or the URL cannot be created.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the file cannot be accessed from one of the roots provided.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the data service is not running.

      • getDataURL

        java.net.URL getDataURL(java.io.File file)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Get a URL for a file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to obtain a URL for.
        Returns:
        A URL that can be used to access the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file does not exist, or the URL cannot be created.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the file cannot be accessed from one of the roots provided.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the data service is not available.

      • download

        void download(java.net.URL url,
              java.io.File to)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Download the contents of a URL to a local file
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to download
        to - The file to download to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getDataFile

        java.io.File getDataFile(java.net.URL url)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Get a File from a URL.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to use
        Returns:
        a File derived from the DataService data directory root(s).
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the URL cannot be accessed from one of the roots provided.
        java.io.IOException

      • getDir

        java.lang.String getDir()
        Get the DataService data directory. The DataService#DATA_DIR system property is first consulted, if that property is not set, the default of System.getProperty("java.io.tmpdir")/sorcer/user/data is used and the DataService#DATA_DIR system property is set.
        Returns:
        The DataService data directory.

      • getDataUrl

        java.lang.String getDataUrl()
        Get the value of the DATA_URL system property
        Returns:
        The value of the DATA_URL system property
